summary:
CW: alcohol, but not anything terrible 

So I ended up being out until 5am for a change since significantly reducing my drinking to basically being sober, and sure, I had four ciders tonight, at maybe 4% or 4,5%, and I saw some people I used to get drunk with, and all I can think is "I'm not really gonna burn a day or be hungover, and I'm gunna remember tonight".
